Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

5 namespace Kassiopeia

8  KSComponentGroup::KSComponentGroup() :
9  KSComponent(),
10  fComponents()
11  {
12  Set( this );
13  }
14  KSComponentGroup::KSComponentGroup( const KSComponentGroup& aCopy ) :
15  KSComponent( aCopy ),
16  fComponents( aCopy.fComponents )
17  {
18  for( ComponentIt tIt = fComponents.begin(); tIt != fComponents.end(); tIt++ )
19  {
20  (*tIt) = (*tIt)->Clone();
21  }
22  Set( this );
23  }
24  KSComponentGroup::~KSComponentGroup()
25  {
26  for( ComponentIt tIt = fComponents.begin(); tIt != fComponents.end(); tIt++ )
27  {
28  delete (*tIt);
29  }
30  }
31 
32  KSComponentGroup* KSComponentGroup::Clone() const
33  {
34  return new KSComponentGroup( *this );
35  }
36  KSComponent* KSComponentGroup::Component( const string& /*aField*/ )
37  {
38  return NULL;
39  }
40  KSCommand* KSComponentGroup::Command( const string& /*aField*/, KSComponent* /*aChild*/ )
41  {
42  return NULL;
43  }

45  KSComponent* KSComponentGroup::ComponentAt( unsigned int anIndex )
46  {
47  return fComponents.at( anIndex );
48  }
49  const KSComponent* KSComponentGroup::ComponentAt( unsigned int anIndex ) const
50  {
51  return fComponents.at( anIndex );
52  }
53  unsigned int KSComponentGroup::ComponentCount() const
54  {
55  return fComponents.size();
56  }
57 
58  void KSComponentGroup::AddComponent( KSComponent* anComponent )
59  {
60  if( anComponent->State() != fState )
61  {
62  objctmsg( eError ) << "tried to add object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> in state <" << anComponent->State() << "> to group <" << this->GetName() << "> in state <" << this->State() << ">" << eom;
63  return;
64  }
65  fComponents.push_back( anComponent );
66  return;
67  }
68  void KSComponentGroup::RemoveComponent( KSComponent* anComponent )
69  {
70  for( ComponentIt tIt = fComponents.begin(); tIt != fComponents.end(); tIt++ )
71  {
72  if( (*tIt) == anComponent )
73  {
74  fComponents.erase( tIt );
75  return;
76  }
77  }
78  objctmsg( eError ) << "cannot remove object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> from group <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom;
79  return;
80  }
81 
82 }
